title: Online Quantum Game Jam
authors: Laura Piispanen, Daria Anttila, Natasha Skult
abstract:
This paper presents and discusses the online version of Quantum Game Jams,
events where quantum physics related games are created. It consists of a
two-part investigation into online Quantum Game Jams. The first part involves
examining three events that took place between 2020 and 2021. The second part
provides a detailed account of organising the Global Quantum Game Jam from 2021
to 2022, evaluating its outcomes based on participant feedback and experiences.
Additionally, it examines the backgrounds of the participants in the global
events of 2021 and 2022. Based on the findings, this paper proposes a set of
guidelines for organising future online Quantum Game Jams, which can also be
applicable to game jams and science game jams in general
